original_text: “When anyone has a defiling skin disease, they must be brought to the priest.
korean_text: 사람에게 나병이 들었거든 그를 제사장에게로 데려갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: When anyone has a defiling skin disease
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가 부정한 피부 병이 있을 때

sentences.original_text: they must be brought to the priest
